snippet: John Fox and the Broncos agreed to part ways after four seasons that included four A.F.C. West titles but four ugly losses in the playoffs.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos part ways with coach John Fox; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and KEN BELSON

lead_paragraph: John Fox and the Broncos agreed to part ways after four seasons that included four A.F.C. West titles but four ugly losses in the playoffs.

headline.main: Fox Out as Broncos’ Coach After Loss to Colts; Manning Ponders Future
headline.print_headline: Fox Out as Broncos’ Coach After Loss to Colts; Manning Ponders Future
